#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int N, A, cnt[1000001];

main()
{
    scanf("%d", &N);
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d", &A);
        cnt[A]++;
    }

    long long ans = 1LL * N * (N - 1) / 2;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)
        ans -= 1LL * cnt[i] * (cnt[i] - 1) / 2;

    printf("%lld", ans);
}
